statements: SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT location, temperature FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT id, location, temperature, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 40
SELECT id, location FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT location, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM EnvironmentalData GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, humidity FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT name AS student_name, email AS student_email FROM Students WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT name, email, location FROM Students JOIN EnvironmentalData ON Students.id = EnvironmentalData.id WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT name, email FROM Students WHERE name LIKE '%A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM geography_projects ORDER BY start_date
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM geography_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM environmental_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_data;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_data WHERE age > 20;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE temperature >= 25 AND humidity <= 60;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensor_info WHERE calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_data ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_data WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_data WHERE measurement_time >= '2022-03-15 10:00:00' ORDER BY measurement_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_info WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE location='USA';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT country, region FROM geographies WHERE climate='Tropical';
SELECT skill_name, skill_level FROM skills WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT country, region, climate FROM geographies WHERE region IS NOT NULL;
SELECT s.name, sk.skill_name, sk.skill_level FROM students s JOIN skills sk ON s.student_id = sk.student_id WHERE sk.skill_level = 'Intermediate';
